lines.text: One morning we paid a sudden visit to the Prime Minister Sheikh Mujibur Rahman's home... It is inappropriate to comment on somebody's breakfast table. But you can see that the breakfast table is modest, perhaps most the modest of any prime minister in the world.

It is not easy to foresee the future of himself and the nation he leads. But there is one thing we can say for sure. A wish of Rahman's father to live with his son shall never be realized. The past, the present and the future of the life of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman are entirely dedicated to Bangladesh.
